entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:40 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: NW 57 km/h gust 75 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
